titleStmt.title: A proclamation for securing the peace in the northern shires
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of May. And of Our Reign the fourth year, 1692.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
